metadata.title: CVE-2017-6596 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
partclone.chkimg in partclone 0.2.89 is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the partclone image header. An attacker may be able to launch a 'Denial of Service attack' in the context of the user running the affected application.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-6596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

partclone - 0.3.11-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: partclone package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.11-1build1').
